Class BasicDatabaseListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.uima.aae.client.UimaAsBaseCallbackListener
      • gov.va.vinci.leo.listener.BaseListener

          • gov.va.vinci.ef.listeners.BasicDatabaseListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.uima.aae.client.UimaASStatusCallbackListener

    public class BasicDatabaseListener
extends gov.va.vinci.leo.listener.BaseDatabaseListener
    This listener will write annotation information to a database table.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BasicDatabaseListener

        public BasicDatabaseListener(gov.va.vinci.leo.model.DatabaseConnectionInformation databaseConnectionInformation,
                             String preparedStatementSQL,
                             int batchSize,
                             boolean validateConnectionEachBatch,
                             ArrayList<ArrayList<String>> fieldList,
                             String dbsName,
                             String tableName,
                             String... inTypes)
        Base gov.va.vinci.leo.listener.
        Parameters:
        databaseConnectionInformation - information on the database to connect to
        preparedStatementSQL - the prepared statement to use for inserts. For example: insert into myTable ( col1, col2, col2) values (?, ?, ?)
        batchSize - the size of batches to do in each insert. Typically 1000 is a good batch size.
        validateConnectionEachBatch - if true, the databaseConnectionInformation.validationQuery will be run before each batch in addition to making sure the connection
        fieldList - String array list of string arrays >
        dbsName -
        tableName -
        inTypes - String array of types to output - EchoExtractor specific, is not needed for other projects.

      • createTable

        public void createTable(boolean dropFirst,
                        String dbsName,
                        String tableName,
                        ArrayList<ArrayList<String>> fieldList)
        Creates the table structure.
        Parameters:
        dropFirst - If drop, the table is dropped before creation.
        dbsName - The database name (needed by some databases for the create statement)
        tableName - The resulting table name
        fieldList - A map of column names (key) and types (value) for example "id", "varchar(20)"
